languages.text: "Сама идея столь дерзновенного попрания законов бытия, установленных Омниссией, бесконечно богохульна. Настолько богохульна, что... почти священна".
"So brazen a violation of the laws of existence set by the Omnissiah — the very idea is infinitely blasphemous. So blasphemous as to... almost be sacred."
languages.original_text: "Сама идея столь дерзновенного попрания законов бытия, установленных Омниссией, бесконечно богохульна. Настолько богохульна, что... почти священна".

traits.locale_text: "The very idea of so brazen a violation of the laws of being set by the Omnissiah is infinitely blasphemous. So blasphemous as to... almost be sacred."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The very idea of so brazen a violation of the laws of being set by the Omnissiah is infinitely blasphemous. So blasphemous as to... almost be sacred."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The very idea of so brazen a violation of the laws of being set by the Omnissiah, is infinitely blasphemous. So blasphemous as to... almost be sacred."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The very idea of so brazen a violation of the laws of being set by the Omnissiah, is infinitely blasphemous. So blasphemous as to... almost be sacred."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "So brazen a violation of the laws of existence set by the Omnissiah — the very idea is infinitely blasphemous. So blasphemous as to... almost be sacred."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "So brazen a violation of the laws of existence set by the Omnissiah — the very idea is infinitely blasphemous. So blasphemous as to... almost be sacred."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Una violación tan osada de las leyes de la existencia dictadas por el Omnissiah... El mero concepto es una blasfemia infinita. Es tan blasfema... que es casi sagrada».
languages.original_text: "So brazen a violation of the laws of existence set by the Omnissiah — the very idea is infinitely blasphemous. So blasphemous as to... almost be sacred."

traits.locale_text: «La idea de una violación tan osada de las leyes del Omnissiah es una blasfemia infinita. Es tan blasfema... que es casi sagrada».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « L'idée même d'une violation si flagrante des lois de l'existence établies par l'Omnimessie est un véritable blasphème. Un blasphème tel... qu'il en deviendrait presque sacré. »
languages.original_text: "So brazen a violation of the laws of existence set by the Omnissiah — the very idea is infinitely blasphemous. So blasphemous as to... almost be sacred."

traits.locale_text: « L'idée même d'une violation si flagrante des lois de l'existence établies par l'Omnimessie est un véritable blasphème. Un blasphème tel... qu'il en deviendrait presque sacré. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「存在の法則の違反が万機神によって定められているなどという馬鹿げた考えは、限りなく冒涜的なものです。冒涜的過ぎて…もはや神聖二すら思える」
languages.original_text: "So brazen a violation of the laws of existence set by the Omnissiah — the very idea is infinitely blasphemous. So blasphemous as to... almost be sacred."

traits.locale_text: 「存在の法則の違反が万機神によって定められているなどという馬鹿げた考えは、限りなく冒涜的なものです。冒涜的過ぎて…もはや神聖二すら思える」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “如此明目张胆地违反欧姆尼塞亚的神圣法则，哪怕仅仅是这样的想法，就已经是无上的亵渎行为。如此亵渎……几乎称得上是神圣。”
languages.original_text: "So brazen a violation of the laws of existence set by the Omnissiah — the very idea is infinitely blasphemous. So blasphemous as to... almost be sacred."

traits.locale_text: “如此明目张胆地违反欧姆尼塞亚的神圣法则，这是无上的亵渎行为。如此亵渎……几乎称得上是神圣之物。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Allein der Gedanke an eine derart dreiste Verletzung der Gesetze des Omnissiah ist schon unendlich blasphemisch. So blasphemisch, dass er ... fast schon heilig ist."
languages.original_text: "So brazen a violation of the laws of existence set by the Omnissiah — the very idea is infinitely blasphemous. So blasphemous as to... almost be sacred."

traits.locale_text: "Allein der Gedanke an eine derart dreiste Verletzung der Gesetze des Omnissiah ist schon unendlich blasphemisch. So blasphemisch, dass er ... fast schon heilig ist."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Hermesih'in koyduğu varoluş kanunlarını ihlal etmek ne büyük küstahlıktır. Bunu düşünmek bile ziyadesiyle günahtır. Neredeyse kutsal sayılacak bir günahtır hem de."
languages.original_text: "So brazen a violation of the laws of existence set by the Omnissiah — the very idea is infinitely blasphemous. So blasphemous as to... almost be sacred."
